item.title: New url for this blog’s feed - please update your syndication!
item.description: I’ve reconfigured my site to serve this blog from a static tree, instead of through cgi. The new syndication url is now: https://blog.pancho.name/index.xml Please, update your agregator settings to fetch the new url instead of the old one. I will REMOVE access to the old one in a few days. Thanks!
